game.name: Earthion
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Earthion is a side-scrolling space shooter developed natively for 16-bit systems. Guide space fighter pilot Azusa Takanashi in her fight to repel the alien invaders and save planet Earth.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Earthion is a side-scrolling space shooter developed natively for 16-bit systems. Guide space fighter pilot Azusa Takanashi in her fight to repel the alien invaders and save planet Earth.

reviewHighlights.text: If you're looking for a brand new horizontal shooter to play, this is the one. Great music, graphics, and gameplay. Not too difficult, lots of variety...
Just finished this (I'm not that good so I went through on Easy) and I have sort of mixed feelings. On a technical level it's fantastic, runs flawless...
